file_results.malicious_behavior: The code contains a hardcoded URL ('https://dapper-flan-46eb5a.netlify.app/api/') which appears to be an external domain. The function 'rpcs' makes a GET request to this URL, combining user-provided 'data' with the endpoint without any validation or sanitation. This behavior is indicative of potential data exfiltration or communication with a command and control server. Additionally, the broad exception handling (catching all requests.RequestException) suppresses errors, which is a common evasion technique in malicious code to hide failures in communication with external servers.
